PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-04852010-04-22,  ,  RC,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectPattison Sign Group, A Division of Jim Pattison Industries Ltd., Remission Order
PrecisREMISSION ORDER remitting $71,711.43 to Pattison Sign Group, A Division of Jim Pattison Industries Ltd. (“Pattison Sign Group”) in respect of the goods and services tax (GST) remitted in error to the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) in January 2001. The amount should have been remitted as Quebec sales tax (QST) instead of GST.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2010-0037 Publication Date: 2010-05-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Pattison Sign Group, A Division of Jim Pattison Industries Ltd., Remission Order
precis: REMISSION ORDER remitting $71,711.43 to Pattison Sign Group, A Division of Jim Pattison Industries Ltd. (“Pattison Sign Group”) in respect of the goods and services tax (GST) remitted in error to the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) in January 2001.  The amount should have been remitted as Quebec sales tax (QST) instead of GST.
